CustomField.formula: Case(Month( Datevalue( CreatedDate ) ), 1, IF(DAY(Datevalue( CreatedDate) )>=23, Date( YEAR( Datevalue( CreatedDate) ) , 04, 23), Date( YEAR( Datevalue( CreatedDate) ) , 01, 23)), 2, Date( YEAR( Datevalue( CreatedDate) ), 04, 23), 3, Date( YEAR(Datevalue( CreatedDate)), 04, 23), 4, IF(DAY(Datevalue( CreatedDate))>=23, Date( YEAR(Datevalue( CreatedDate) ) , 07, 23), Date( YEAR( Datevalue( CreatedDate)) , 04, 23)), 5, Date( YEAR( Datevalue( CreatedDate) ), 07, 23), 6, Date( YEAR( Datevalue( CreatedDate) ) , 07, 23), 7, IF(DAY(Datevalue( CreatedDate))>=15, Date( YEAR( Datevalue( CreatedDate) ) , 10, 23), Date( YEAR(Datevalue( CreatedDate)) , 07, 23)), 8, Date( YEAR(Datevalue( CreatedDate)) , 10, 23), 9, Date( YEAR(Datevalue( CreatedDate)) , 10, 23), 10, IF(DAY(Datevalue( CreatedDate))>=15, Date( YEAR(Datevalue( CreatedDate))+1 , 01, 23), Date( YEAR( Datevalue( CreatedDate)) , 10, 23)), 11, Date( YEAR( Datevalue( CreatedDate))+1 , 01, 23), 12, Date( YEAR( Datevalue( CreatedDate))+1, 01, 23), today())
CustomField.label: Effective Date of Change
